```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
ls("package:uuid")
```


```{r}
ids <- UUIDgenerate(use.time = TRUE, 
                    n = 100, 
                    output = "raw")
ids %>% str
ids %>% as.UUID

ids <- UUIDgenerate(use.time = TRUE, 
                    n = 100, 
                    output = "string")
ids %>% as.UUID

ids <- UUIDgenerate(use.time = TRUE, 
                    n = 100, 
                    output = "uuid")
ids %>% str
```
